name: Premium Whey Protein Isolate
description: Fast-absorbing whey protein isolate with 25g of protein per serving. Perfect for post-workout recovery and muscle building.
ingredients: Whey Protein Isolate, Natural Flavors, Lecithin, Stevia Extract

name: Pure Creatine Monohydrate
description: Clinically proven creatine monohydrate to increase strength, power, and muscle mass. Unflavored and micronized for easy mixing.

name: BCAA Energy Formula
description: Essential amino acids with natural caffeine for energy and recovery. Perfect for intra-workout or anytime energy boost.
ingredients: L-Leucine, L-Isoleucine, L-Valine, Natural Caffeine, Natural Flavors

name: Pre-Workout Extreme
description: High-stimulant pre-workout with beta-alanine, citrulline, and 300mg caffeine for explosive energy and focus.
ingredients: Citrulline Malate, Beta-Alanine, Caffeine Anhydrous, L-Tyrosine, Natural Flavors

name: Sport Multivitamin
description: Complete multivitamin designed for active individuals. 25+ vitamins and minerals to support performance and recovery.
ingredients: Vitamin C, Vitamin D3, B-Complex Vitamins, Iron, Zinc, Magnesium, and 20+ other vitamins and minerals

name: Post-Workout Recovery
description: Advanced recovery formula with glutamine, tart cherry, and electrolytes to reduce soreness and speed recovery.
ingredients: L-Glutamine, Tart Cherry Extract, Electrolyte Blend, Natural Flavors

name: Slow-Release Casein Protein
description: Slow-digesting casein protein perfect for nighttime recovery. Provides sustained amino acid release for up to 8 hours.
ingredients: Micellar Casein, Natural Flavors, Lecithin, Stevia Extract

name: Thermogenic Fat Burner
description: Advanced thermogenic formula with green tea extract, L-carnitine, and cayenne to support metabolism and fat burning.
ingredients: Green Tea Extract, L-Carnitine, Cayenne Pepper, Chromium Picolinate, Caffeine
